definition: to age/to deteriorate with age/old and weak
to decline/to wane/to become weak or feeble

prefix used before the surname of a person or a numeral indicating the order of birth of the children in a family or to indicate affection or familiarity/old (of people)/venerable (person)/experienced/of long standing/always/all the time/of the past/very/outdated/(of meat etc) tough

sentences.english: Alterna Professional Haircare uses caviar extract in its Caviar Anti-Aging collection.
sentences.chinese: 替代专业护发品使用鱼子酱提取的鱼子酱抗衰老收集。

sentences.english: It made clear that temperature is an important influence factor for flesh color and senescence of fruits under storage.
sentences.chinese: 这表明温度对采后梅果果肉色泽及衰老有很大的影响。

sentences.english: Studied the antisenility effect of liquorice flavone on mice.
sentences.chinese: 研究了甘草黄酮对小鼠的抗衰老作用。

sentences.english: I am too old and too empty now to live much longer without you.
sentences.chinese: 失去了你，我如此衰老，如此空寂，已难久活人世。

sentences.english: In other words, ageing is not only stoppable but also reversible.
sentences.chinese: 换句话说就是衰老不仅可以阻止，而且可以逆转。

sentences.english: Age factors by the body or organs of the lower speed of aging process, called by age.
sentences.chinese: 减龄因素使身体或器官衰老速度降低的过程，叫减龄。

sentences.english: Being proved by modern medical research, it also helps to delay the decrepitude of skin.
sentences.chinese: 现代医学证明，它还可以起到延缓皮肤衰老的作用。

sentences.english: A new antiaging skin cream is designed to do just that.
sentences.chinese: 一种新的抗衰老护肤霜是为了做到这一点。

sentences.english: Some researches have shown that the lack of co-enzyme Q10 is the major cause of decrepitude.
sentences.chinese: 研究显示，辅酶Q10的缺乏是导致衰老的重要原因。

sentences.english: It’s no longer enough to simply slather some creamy concoction on dry skin.
sentences.chinese: 抗衰老已不再只是简单往干燥皮肤上擦面霜了。

sentences.english: Permanent cells have left the cell cycle and are destined to senesce and die.
sentences.chinese: 永久性细胞已脱离细胞周期，注定要衰老和死亡。

sentences.english: Objective To investigate the delaying aging mechanism of selenium on neurons.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨硒延缓神经细胞衰老的作用机制。

sentences.english: Objective It is to observe the anti-aging effect of Tongbi Keli.
sentences.chinese: 目的观察痛痹颗粒抗衰老作用。

sentences.english: A preliminary study on change patterns of ethylene production during flower opening and senescence in cut roses (Chinese with English Abstract).
sentences.chinese: 月季切花开花和衰老进程中乙烯变化类型初探。

sentences.english: Objective To evaluate the effect of radix astragali in antiaging .
sentences.chinese: 目的研究黄芪的抗衰老作用及作用机制。

sentences.english: She also advises against anything with the words "anti-aging."
sentences.chinese: 琼斯还建议不要买任何上面写着“抗衰老”的东西。

definition: telomere, a protective DNA cap on a chromosome
to decline/to fall/to drop/to falter/a decline/recession (in economics)
to recover one's youthful vigor/to feel rejuvenated (idiom)
